com.team23.weather.observer

Interface ILocaleObserver

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ChangeUnitsPanel, CurrentForecastPanel, DailyForecastPanel, HourlyForecastPanel, MarsForecastPanel, OwmClient

    public interface ILocaleObserver
    Using this interface, an object can handle changes in the LocaleSettings model. Changes to the LocaleSettings model are appropriated by App.
    Author:
    Saquib Mian

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onLocaleChange(LocaleSettings locale)
      After the LocaleSettings object has changed

    • Method Detail

      • onLocaleChange

        void onLocaleChange(LocaleSettings locale)
        After the LocaleSettings object has changed
        Parameters:
        locale - the new representation of the LocaleSettings object
